name: Cell Warriors
description:
This is a try of making a vampire survivors like game in less than 3 hours! You move a cell, need to get food and escape enemies to survive and reproduce. It's probably cool on the starting 5 minutes and after that it's pretty annoying. Anyways, this was a try of making trijam in c, I hope you get some fun here!

I made it for TRIJAM 197, but forgot to link the post in the page X-X

CONTROLS

WASD -> move

Get those little blue squares to grow up.

Avoid the blue cells
